Description:
Prime Strathdale Position
Beautifully renovated throughout this 3-bedroom residence with 2 generous living areas provides an abundance of natural light and includes a stylish new kitchen that overlooks the super-sized allotment of approx 960m2.
2 new contemporary styled bathrooms including a magnificent walk in robe and ensuite to the spacious main bedroom complimented with ducted heating and cooling throughout.
A spacious undercover alfresco area
Ideally suited to a fastidious buyer that appreciates a quality neighbourhood and 3 km from the CBD.
Within a short walk to parks and public transport and numerous other amenities.
All the benefits of an extensively renovated home.

Description:
Inspect Thursday 3rd September 5pm - 5:30pm
This weatherboard home is positioned on a corner allotment in a quiet street just one block from Bendigos Botanical Gardens and the White Hills Swimming Pool. Also walking distance to primary and secondary schools, bus stops, chemist, bank, post office and more, the property is ideally positioned near all amenities and less than 10 minutes to Bendigos city centre. Currently tenanted at $240pw
Indoors, the main entry leads to two generously proportioned bedrooms, both with ceiling fans and one with a built-in robe. The hallway also leads to a family bathroom, linen closet and a laundry with a door to the rear.
Double timber and glass sliding doors from the entry open into a large lounge that opens into a kitchen and dining room. The kitchen, like much of the home, offers original detail including a range oven and retro cabinetry. Further details, such as the pedestal sink in the bathroom, decorative cornice throughout and original timber flooring, provide plenty of character.
The rear door opens out to a concrete alfresco space, large enough to enjoy meals outdoors. A toilet, attached to the home, can be accessed via this area and steps lead down on each side to the yard. Double gates at one side of the house provide secure vehicle storage at the end of the driveway.
Additional features include:
Gas heating and air conditioning
Original features including timber flooring, high ceilings and decorative cornice
Kitchen appliances including original range oven, gas oven with separate grill and four-burner cooktop
Access to the rear yard from both sides of the home
Secure vehicle access to the rear yard
Currently serving as a rental property, this home offers a fantastic return and provides excellent investment potential. Alternatively, the possibility exists for a buyer looking to enter the housing market to really add value and create something special.
Insights: 59 Raglan Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020 and 9 other 2 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Botanica Green Estate-Perfect Location
Such a great opportunity to purchase one of the few vacant blocks remaining in this superb subdivision. Adjacent to the stunning Botanical Gardens, perfect for family picnics or a great place just to enjoy the beautiful surrounds. A short walk to the bike and walking track which takes you to Lake Weeroona and the CBD. Walking distance to Primary and Secondary Schools. Only a short drive to the CBD. Title is available so you may be eligible to apply for the $25,000 home builders grant. The block size is 524 sq.m. All services available. Call me today for further information.

Description:
A Premium Piece in The Peppercorns
' Titled ready to go for all eligible for the new home builder government grant of $25,000.'
Located less than 3km from the Bendigo CBD The Peppercorns has established itself as a tranquil family neighbourhood in high demand over the last decade.
This premium block is now available with views overlooking the Bendigo Creek and bushland overlook.
Features of this block include:
- Reserve Outlook
- 17.4m frontage
- Fully serviced (including recycled water and NBN fibre to the premise)
- Flat building sites
- Optimal north facing for modern living spaces and outdoor entertaining
Established pedestrian and transport links provide a variety of schools and childcare within your five minute neighbourhood.
Taking a stroll along the Bendigo Creek Trail to the south you will find the Lake Weeroona Precinct and adjoining Bendigo Tennis Centre, to the north the newly expanded Bendigo Botanical Gardens and nearby amenities like Get Naked Espresso, Australia Post, Amcal Pharmacy and local White Hills Butcher.

Description:
Affordable Brick Veneer in a Great Location
An excellent opportunity exists to purchase this solid brick veneer home in a quiet court in White Hills.
Set on a 647m2 allotment with dual access from the rear of the home, this property will excite anyone looking for a solid first home, or addition to any property portfolio with exceptional rental returns on offer.
The home is situated at the end of the court with bushland and walking tracks into Bendigo and the Botanical Gardens at your doorstep, you'll jump at the opportunity to wander along the Bendigo Creek.
The home consists of three bedrooms all with built-in robes, functional kitchen with breakfast bar, gas cooktop and electric wall oven.
The laundry is of a good size along with the central three piece bathroom linking the rest of the home.
New split-system and gas furnace have all your heating and cooling needs covered for all year-round comfort.
Outside there is plenty of room to establish gardens, and the undercover pergola provides a relaxing place to sit and unwind. Double gates provide easy access to the backyard and large shed which has a concrete floor and power.
Close to schools, transport, sporting facilities, CBD and Botanical Gardens, this property has a multitude of options to cater for all segments of the market.
Be quick to arrange your private inspection as the Bendigo market is HOT, HOT, HOT!
Insights: 33 Nottingham Court, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
LIVE IN OR RENT OUT!!
Built in 2013, this very neat home is sited on a low maintenance block in a quiet court with only 10 other dwellings. Ducted heating and cooling ensure year round comfort, whilst the 3KW solar power keeps energy costs to a minimum, in a home that is also very low maintenance. Featuring 3 good sized bedrooms, main with walk-in-robe and ensuite, the others with built-in-robes, separate lounge, kitchen with dishwasher, generous pantry and a study nook, you could just move in and relax. The double garage has excellent height clearance, remote roller door, internal access to the home and a single rear roller door accessing the back yard. The covered Al Fresco area is a very generous 18m2, a great size for entertaining family and friends. Schools, public transport, Aldi, Bunnings, train station and the expanded Epsom shopping centre are in close vicinity. Currently rented to a long term, reliable tenant, but vacant possession is available. So don't delay, a truly " No Worries" prospect!!
Internal area
158m²

Description:
Same Same but Different
Built by Lansell Homes in 2018, this 3-bedroom home has everything you would expect in a new build including BRAND NEW carpets & a fresh coat of paint throughout.
White-wash timber look vinyl planks throughout the entry and spacious kitchen with gas cooktop, wall oven, dishwasher, pantry and plenty of cupboard & bench space. The meals area adjoins the carpeted living area.
Master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite with extra-wide vanity. The other two bedrooms with built-in robes with both hanging and shelving space.
The family bathroom features a separate bath, shower and vanity basin and laundry.
Gas ducted heating and ducted evaporative cooling throughout.
Outside is an undercover alfresco with low maintenance yard scope for your very own vegetable patch.
Located at the end of this quiet court, you will have easy access to walking & bike tracks to Lake Weeroona & Bendigo CBD.
This one is for the First Home Buyers, downsizers, and investors looking for a long-term investment opportunity with a strong rental yield.
Inspections by Appointment Only.

Description:
HEAR THE SCHOOL BELLS!
A comfortable and well presented, rendered brick veneer property on 647m2 block (approx.) in popular White Hills.
- 3 good sized bedrooms all with built-in robes
- Updated kitchen with breakfast bar, dishwasher and modern 900mm stainless steel upright stove
- Polished pine timber floors throughout
- Good sized lounge with gas heating and split system for all year comfort
- Updated tiled three-piece bathroom
- Outdoor Timber deck perfect for entertaining when the coronavirus is over of course
- Good sized yard with colour bond fencing, single lockup garage with roller door plus additional off-street parking.
Handy to all facilities including schools, shops, parks and public transport. Walk Lake Weeroona. This affordable property will be hard to beat for the first home buyer, family or investor! Available with vacant possession or existing tenancy.

Description:
Investors Take Note!
This low maintenance, modern property features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a double remote garage with internal access & already has a tenant in place. Step inside to the entrance hall which includes a handy double storage cupboard. Continue along to the main bedroom which contains a walk in robe & 3 piece ensuite. The well designed, open plan living space offers dining, kitchen & lounge areas all filled with natural light. Modern appliances & a built in pantry are features of the functional kitchen. A hallway leads to the 2 remaining bedrooms both with built in robes, the family bathroom (which also contains a european laundry), separate toilet & linen cupboard. Ducted heating, a split system & ceiling fans maintain comfort control throughout the home. Sliding glass doors access the compact backyard & also a concreted courtyard/bbq area. Located in a quiet court within walking distance to shops, Primary & Secondary Schools, Botanic Gardens, Bowling Club & public transport, this fabulous property would make a great addition to your investment portfolio with an expected rental return of $330 per week.

Description:
GREAT INVESTMENT OR A HOME TO MAKE YOUR OWN
This neat and tidy brick home is located just minutes from White Hills Botanical Gardens, swimming pool and primary school. Positioned in a family-friendly, established street with good neighbours, the home offers a neat, landscaped front garden and off-street parking. The front door opens into a spacious open plan kitchen, living and dining room with ceiling fan and split system heating and cooling. The kitchen features ample storage, and a glass sliding door from the living space opens to the outdoors.
Off the living area is a hallway leading to the bedrooms. The master, at the front of the home, offers an incredibly spacious, recently refurbished modern ensuite and a built-in robe. The remaining two bedrooms both feature built-in robes and one room enjoys a ceiling fan. This section of the home also includes a laundry with a door to the rear yard; a family bathroom; and separate toilet. Outdoors, the single carport has a roller door allowing secure vehicle access to the large alfresco area at the rear. This great undercover space runs along the side of the house and joins the shed in the rear corner of the block, providing a fantastic year-round, outdoor entertaining area. At the back of the home, the garden is set to lawn with established trees and, around the side, there is a huge lemon tree and a water tank.
Additional features include:
- Split system heating and cooling
- Air conditioning
- Ceiling fan
- Oven, separate grill and four-burner gas cooktop in kitchen
- Carport with roller door
- Shed
- Water tank (10,000l)
A rare opportunity to secure a two-bathroom, three-bedroom property in this price range, the home would be absolutely ideal for a young family starting out, or for an investor looking for the potential to add value. With plenty of possibility, this is a property that offers easy living now and the chance to add your own stamp at a time that suits.
Insights: 36 Dundas Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
GREAT LOCATION - CALLING ALL 1ST HOME BUYERS!
Tucked away off the main road, surrounded by established houses and backing onto the Bendigo Racecourse, these affordable land allotments are perfect for the 1st home owner looking to get into the market, along with those looking for a low maintenance investment with decent ROI.
These blocks are situated close to schools (6 min either to Epsom or two Bendigo CBD), supermarket, service station and take away options, and provide an excellent opportunity in the ever growing and fast developing White Hills precinct.
Priced to sell with a motivated developer, with suitable house and land options available, give us a call today to discuss your real estate options!

Description:
Original family home that requires work on a lovely block of 669m2
- Family home in original condition (requires work) offering four bedrooms and two bathrooms
- Large workshop or undercover parking for vehicles
- Very nice block of approximately 669m2 zoned general residential
- Spacious large kitchen and separate large lounge
- Gas heating and airconditioner for all seasons
- Opportunity to really add value to this original home with some cosmetic changes and structural work
- Only minutes to Lake Weeroona, Bendigo CBD, Golf club and the beautiful botanic gardens
- Some original features such as combustion stove, IXL stove etc Modern appliances also
- Walk to Botanic gardens, shops, medical, schools, jockey club, bus stop and all amenities
If you are wanting an affordable home in a very central location that presents an opportunity to add value and put your own stamp on the home then look no further. This is a very liveable home that could be leased immediately or alternatively a family could simply move in. It offers great potential for improvement and is in the right locale to undertake value adding.

Description:
Ideal Location close to Lake Weeroona
The options are abundant at 364 Napier Street in its prime central White Hills location.
The charming investor gives you the flexibility to invest and refresh with its offerings, run your dream business (STCA) with its large block size giving you plenty of parking options, or move in and plan for the future.
Just 350m to Weeroona Oval, 1km to Lake Weeroona and Boardwalk Cafe, what's not to love about the location?
Entering the generous 750m2 property you'll admire the well-manicured front yard and character of the large decorative front porch highlighting the 70s era.
Step inside and either navigate to the right housing all three large bedrooms, or head left to the large light and bright lounge room, boasting a gas heater and brick mantle.
The open meals and kitchen area is naturally lit and offers up plenty of space, storage options and stove, and has an ideal footprint for some fresh touches of your own. Past the laundry with separate toilet and you have access to your secure large backyard complete with a carport and shedding.
Unique to this property is the handy side access drive way through double gates.
Absolutely ideal in location and a nifty little price tag to match.

Description:
Three Bedroom Family Home in Popular White Hills
Well-planned and well-loved, is this well-presented family home.
Featuring three bedrooms, with built-in robes in two, and a large walk-in robe in the main, which also has an ensuite.
The two spacious living areas include a formal lounge at the front, as well as an open-plan family, dining and kitchen which leads outside onto BBQ/alfresco area with pergola awing.
The kitchen is well-planned and appointed, having plenty of bench space, cupboard storage, dishwasher and near-new double stove.
Ducted evaporative cooling and ducted gas heating, plus a large built-in storage area, which could be utilised as a study nook if required.
Outside is a double garage with direct access into the home, as well as out to the backyard for the trailer or another car.
Also included is a handy garden shed.
Located in a very tightly held and popular area. This fantastic home offers all the features to make a family very comfortable. Just a short walk to schools, shops, sporting grounds, public transport, walking tracks and Botanical Gardens parkland.
A must to inspect!

Description:
Neat as a Pin!
Built by a local Bendigo builder in 2018, this 3-bedroom home has everything you would expect in a new build and first home buyers are eligible for the First Home Buyers grant.
Tiled entry leads to the spacious kitchen with 900mm gas cooktop, stainless steel canopy range hood, wall oven, dishwasher, walk-in pantry and plenty of cupboard & bench space. The tiled meals area adjoins the carpeted light and bright living area.
Master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite with an extra-wide vanity and double sinks. The other two bedrooms with built-in robes.
The family bathroom features a separate bath, shower and vanity basin and laundry with built-in storage.
Outside is an undercover alfresco with low maintenance and neat landscaping.
This home has had built-in additional features, but not limited to the below;
- Downlights throughout
- Ducted Gas Heating and Ducted Evaporative Cooling
- Block out blinds added to the master bedroom and roller blinds throughout the rest of the home
- Upgraded fixtures in Kitchen
- Pendant lighting and external light fittings/powerpoints upgraded from standard
At the end of this quiet court, you will have easy access to walking & bike tracks to Lake Weeroona & Bendigo CBD.
This one is for the First Home Buyers and investors looking for a long term investment opportunity with a strong rental yield.

Description:
Stylish Home on 1500m2 (approx) Allotment
This beautifully presented, custom built property features high ceilings & polished floorboards & is positioned in a quiet street, directly across from native bush land. The family friendly layout offers 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 3 living areas & abundant outdoor space. Step from the front verandah into the formal lounge, which oozes natural light & provides a lovely outlook & double glass door access to the yard. The sizeable main bedroom contains an ensuite & walk in robe. All remaining bedrooms offer built in robes, the versatile 4th, is currently used as a study. A generous open plan kitchen/dining/lounge area leads out to an inviting, undercover deck - perfect for entertaining. There's also another separate rumpus room, a spacious laundry & a 3 piece family bathroom with toilet adjacent. Great storage options are provided throughout the home, while ducted heating & cooling maintains temperature control. Convenient side access leads to the large, 6x9m shed with concrete floor. There's also a double garage. Close to schools, shops & transport, this unique property is less than 10 minutes drive from the CBD, yet it offers space, privacy & tranquility.

Description:
FANTASTIC STARTER HOME OR EASY INVESTMENT
Positioned towards the end of a quiet, family-friendly court this weatherboard home is just minutes to shops, schools and Lake Weeroona. With a bus stop just down the road, the centre of Bendigo is only five minutes away.
A brick paved driveway under a double carport provides good off-street parking, and double gates allow secure vehicle access to the rear yard. The front door opens into an entry hall and character detail, such as high ceilings and decorative cornice, provide a great feel to the light-filled home. The hallway leads around to three good-sized bedrooms, all with built-in robes and ceiling fans, as well as a family bathroom.
Off the main entry is the spacious lounge and dining room. A gas heater sits in the original brick fireplace, and windows across the front of the home let in plenty of natural light. The dining room opens into a spacious kitchen with ample storage and modern appliances. A large laundry off the kitchen has a door leading out to the rear garden.
A decked alfresco space runs along the rear of the home, and additional separate undercover area with power and lights offers two outdoor living areas perfect for entertaining. The remainder of the garden is set to lawn with easy-care garden beds. A shed in the corner of the block provides additional vehicle storage.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling
Split system heating and cooling
Ceiling fans throughout
Gas heating
Modern kitchen appliances including dishwasher, four-burner gas cooktop and oven
6m x 3.6m shed with concrete floor and power
Water tank
With plenty of opportunity to add value, this property is ideal for a buyer looking to step onto the property ladder and secure a home that doesnt require a great deal of work. Having served as a rental, the home would also suit an investor seeking an affordable and low-maintenance option in an established area.
